briefTitle: Study of BK1301 (DTaP Vaccine) as a Booster in Adolescents

armGroups.label: BK1301
interventionNames: Biological: Diphtheria and Tetanus Toxoids and Acellular Pertussis Vaccine Adsorbed (DTaP vaccine, BK1301)

armGroups.label: DT toxoid
interventionNames: Biological: Adsorbed Diphtheria-Tetanus Combined Toxoid (DT toxoid)

interventions.name: Diphtheria and Tetanus Toxoids and Acellular Pertussis Vaccine Adsorbed (DTaP vaccine, BK1301)

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Age 11 or 12 years on the day of injection
* Received 3 or 4 doses of DTaP vaccine

Exclusion Criteria:

* History of pertussis, diphtheria, tetanus
* History of anaphylaxis to vaccine components
* Serious conditions or diseases of the heart, vein, blood, respiratory, hepar, kidney, digestive system, psychiatric or nervous system
* Transfused or received gamma globulin within 3 months, or received high-dose gamma globulin within 6 months before the day of injection

outcomeMeasures.title: Percentage of Participants With Booster Responses for Anti-diphtheria Toxoid (Anti-D) and Anti-tetanus Toxoid (Anti-T) Antibodies
outcomeMeasures.description: Booster response was defined as post titer ≥ 0.4 IU/mL and post/pre titer ≥ 4 increase.

outcomeMeasures.title: Percentage of Participants With Booster Responses for Anti-pertussis Toxoid (Anti-PT) and Anti-Filamentous Hemagglutinin (Anti-FHA) Antibodies
outcomeMeasures.description: Booster response was defined as post titer ≥ 20 EU/mL and post/pre titer ≥ 4 increase in a subject with pre titer \< 20 EU/mL, or post/pre titer ≥ 2 increase in a subject with pre titer ≥ 20 EU/mL.

outcomeMeasures.title: Percentage of Participants With Anti-D and Anti-T Antibody Titers Above Protocol Defined Cut-off Values
outcomeMeasures.description: Protocol defined cut-off values were 0.1 IU/mL for anti-D and 0.01 IU/mL for anti-T.

outcomeMeasures.title: Percentage of Participants With Anti-PT and Anti-FHA Antibody Titers Above Protocol Defined Cut-off Values
outcomeMeasures.description: Protocol defined cut-off values were 10 EU/mL.

outcomeMeasures.title: Geometric Mean Titers (GMTs) of Anti-D and Anti-T Antibodies
Geometric Mean Titers (GMTs) of Anti-PT and Anti-FHA Antibodies
Geometric Mean Titer Ratios of Anti-D and Anti-T Antibodies
outcomeMeasures.description: Ratios were calculated as 28-42 days after vaccination titers over pre vaccination titers

outcomeMeasures.title: Geometric Mean Titer Ratios of Anti-PT and Anti-FHA Antibodies
outcomeMeasures.description: Ratios were calculated as 28-42 days after vaccination titers over pre vaccination titers

outcomeMeasures.title: Percentage of Participants With Adverse Events
